name: Blekathlon
description: Modern, elegant and fast Bludit theme for your blog, portfolio or showcase site.

features.1: Categories appear automatically in the menu if they have pages
features.2: Static pages are automatically added to the footer
features.3: Related pages support (need 4 or more pages in Category)
features.4: Social media integration (Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc.) and share buttons for Facebook and Twitter
